com.flowpowered.caustic.lwjgl.gl20

Class GL20FrameBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flowpowered.caustic.api.Creatable
      • com.flowpowered.caustic.api.gl.FrameBuffer
        • com.flowpowered.caustic.lwjgl.gl20.GL20FrameBuffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GLVersioned

    public class GL20FrameBuffer
extends FrameBuffer
    An OpenGL 2.0 implementation of FrameBuffer using EXT.
    See Also:
    FrameBuffer

    • Constructor Detail

      • GL20FrameBuffer

        public GL20FrameBuffer()
        Constructs a new frame buffer for OpenGL 2.0. If no EXT extension for frame buffers is available, an exception is thrown.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - If the hardware doesn't support EXT frame buffers
